SELECT C.LV1_CD ,C.LV1_NM ,C.LV2_CD ,C.LV2_NM ,A.LV3_CD ,A.LV3_NM
,SUM_SALE_AMT AS SUM_SALE ,SUM( CASE WHEN GENDR_FG = 'F' THEN SUM_SALE_AMT ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_GENDR_F" ,SUM( CASE WHEN GENDR_FG = 'G' THEN SUM_SALE_AMT ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_GENDR_G" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 10 AND AGE < 21 THEN SUM_SALE_AMT ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGETEENS" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 20 AND AGE < 31 THEN SUM_SALE_AMT ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGETWENTIES" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 30 AND AGE < 41 THEN SUM_SALE_AMT ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGETHIRTIES" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 40 AND AGE < 51 THEN SUM_SALE_AMT ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGEFORTIES" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 50 AND AGE < 61 THEN SUM_SALE_AMT ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGEFIFTIES" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 60 THEN SUM_SALE_AMT ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGESIXTIES"
,SUM_SALE_QTY AS SUM_SALE ,SUM( CASE WHEN GENDR_FG = 'F' THEN SUM_SALE_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_GENDR_F" ,SUM( CASE WHEN GENDR_FG = 'G' THEN SUM_SALE_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_GENDR_G" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 10 AND AGE < 21 THEN SUM_SALE_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGETEENS" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 20 AND AGE < 31 THEN SUM_SALE_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGETWENTIES" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 30 AND AGE < 41 THEN SUM_SALE_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGETHIRTIES" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 40 AND AGE < 51 THEN SUM_SALE_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGEFORTIES" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 50 AND AGE < 61 THEN SUM_SALE_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGEFIFTIES" ,SUM( CASE WHEN AGE > 60 THEN SUM_SALE_QTY ELSE 0 END ) AS "SUM_AGESIXTIES"
FROM ( SELECT tmmph.SALE_DATE, thp.PROD_CLASS_CD AS LV3_CD, thpc.PROD_CLASS_NM AS LV3_NM, tmm.MEMBR_NO, tmm.GENDR_FG, SBPENC.D ( tmm.MEMBR_NM ) AS MEMBR_NM, TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'yyyy' ) - SUBSTR( tmm.BIRTHDAY, 0, 4 ) AS AGE, SUM( tssd.SALE_QTY ) AS SUM_SALE_QTY, SUM( tssd.SALE_AMT ) AS SUM_SALE_AMT FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_POINT_HIST tmmph LEFT JOIN TB_SL_SALE_DTL tssd ON tssd.STORE_CD = tmmph.STORE_CD AND tssd.BILL_NO = tmmph.BILL_NO AND tssd.POS_NO = tmmph.POS_NO LEFT JOIN TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp ON thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tssd.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thp.HQ_BRAND_CD = tssd.HQ_BRAND_CD AND thp.PROD_CD = tssd.PROD_CD LEFT JOIN TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS thpc ON thpc.PROD_CLASS_CD = thp.PROD_CLASS_CD AND thpc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD LEFT JOIN TB_MB_MEMBER tmm ON tmm.MEMBR_NO = tmmph.MEMBR_NO AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmph.MEMBR_ORGN_CD WHERE tmmph.POINT_CHG_FG IN ( '4', '6' ) AND tssd.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY thpc.PROD_CLASS_CD, tmm.MEMBR_NO, tmm.MEMBR_NM, tmm.GENDR_FG, thp.PROD_CLASS_CD, thpc.PROD_CLASS_NM, tmmph.SALE_DATE, TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'yyyy' ) - SUBSTR( tmm.BIRTHDAY, 0, 4 ) ) A, (SELECT A.P_PROD_CLASS_CD AS LV1_CD, ( SELECT SF_GET_PROD_CLASSES ( 'H', #{hqOfficeCd}, A.P_PROD_CLASS_CD ) FROM DUAL ) AS LV1_NM, A.PROD_CLASS_CD AS LV2_CD, A.PROD_CLASS_NM AS LV2_NM, B.PROD_CLASS_CD AS LV3_CD, B.PROD_CLASS_NM AS LV3_NM FROM ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, P_PROD_CLASS_CD, PROD_CLASS_CD, PROD_CLASS_NM FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND P_PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND P_PROD_CLASS_CD = '00000' ) ) A, TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS B WHERE B.P_PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND P_PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND P_PROD_CLASS_CD = '00000' ) ) AND A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = B.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND A.PROD_CLASS_CD = B.P_PROD_CLASS_CD ) C WHERE C.LV3_CD = A.LV3_CD GROUP BY C.LV1_CD, C.LV1_NM, C.LV2_CD, C.LV2_NM, A.LV3_CD, A.LV3_NM, SUM_SALE_QTY, SUM_SALE_AMT
